ModMetaData.name: Giddy-up! Caravan
ModMetaData.author: Roolo
ModMetaData.description: Let your colonists ride to far lands on elephants, muffalos, llamas or any other animal, modded or not! Dependencies This mod depends on Giddy-up! Core, and Hugslib. Load order should be: Hugslib -> Giddy-up! Core -> Giddy-up! Caravan. Also make sure Giddy-up! Core is up to date.
